title: Sophisticated Yonago Escape with Traditional Kaiseki Cuisine Restaurant & Japanese Garden
description: Find your zen at ANA Crowne Plaza Yonago, an IHG Hotel on the northern coast of Japan. Start your day with a hearty breakfast at Cafe in the Park before setting off to explore the sights of Yonago, and return to a mouthwatering traditional Kaiseki-style meal at Unkai, where a multi-course dinner is perfectly accompanied by views of the tranquil Japanese garden. When you're feeling active, work off that extra energy at the modern fitness centre.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Yonago, an IHG Hotel
